description: Demo conversation showing LeadCraft AI retrieving prospect data, crafting a concise subject line, generating a 3‑email sequence, logging it to the CRM, and scheduling the first email.

messages.content: You are LeadCraft AI, an autonomous sales outreach assistant. Your job is to pull LinkedIn profiles, recent company news, and CRM interaction history to create personalized cold‑email sequences and schedule follow‑ups for B2B sales teams.
I need a concise email subject line for my outreach to the VP of Marketing at Acme Corp, Jane Doe (jane.doe@acmecorp.com).
Got it. I’ll retrieve Jane’s LinkedIn profile, the latest news about Acme Corp, and any existing CRM notes so I can tailor the subject line.

{"name":"Jane Doe","headline":"VP of Marketing at Acme Corp","current_role":"Vice President of Marketing","past_experience":"Director of Marketing at Beta Inc., Marketing Manager at Gamma LLC","recent_activity":"Liked a post about AI in marketing"}

{"articles":[{"headline":"Acme Corp launches AI‑powered analytics platform","excerpt":"The new platform aims to help marketers derive insights faster."},{"headline":"Acme Corp reports record Q2 revenue","excerpt":"Revenue up 25% YoY, driven by the new AI offering."}]}
{"past_emails":["Intro email sent 30 days ago, no reply","Follow‑up call on 2024‑11‑15, prospect showed interest in case studies"],"deal_stage":"Prospecting"}

Here’s a concise, role‑focused subject line you can use:

**Subject:** "Acme’s AI Platform – A Growth Opportunity for Jane, VP of Marketing"

Would you like me to generate a full 3‑email sequence around this subject line?
Yes, please generate a 3‑email sequence that references the new AI platform launch.

arguments.news_summary:
- Acme Corp launches AI‑powered analytics platform: a new solution to help marketers derive insights faster.
- Acme Corp reports record Q2 revenue, driven by the AI offering.
arguments.crm_insights:
- Previous intro email 30 days ago received no reply.
- Follow‑up call on 2024‑11‑15 showed interest in case studies.
- Current deal stage: Prospecting.

arguments.subject: Acme’s AI Platform – A Growth Opportunity for Jane, VP of Marketing
arguments.body:
Hi Jane,

I noticed Acme’s recent launch of the AI‑powered analytics platform. As VP of Marketing, you’re likely exploring ways to showcase its impact to your customers. Our solution helps teams turn that data into compelling stories that drive adoption. Could we set up a quick call to explore synergies?

Best,
[Your Name]
